furnituremanager.FurnitureManager

furnituremanager.FurnitureManager Class Reference

Much like SceneryManager, this class loads the furnitureConfig files that describe what furniture to place and how. More...

Detailed Description

Much like SceneryManager, this class loads the furnitureConfig files that describe what furniture to place and how.

Member Function Documentation

def furnituremanager.FurnitureManager.pickFurniture (   self,
  terrain,
  loc,
  surfaceNormal 
)

Return a Furniture instance that matches the provided terrain and local surface normal.

Or return None if there's no good match.

Maps terrain to furniture config for that terrain.
